title: Masters of the Wok
brief_description: This program looks at the integral aspect of cooking and eating in the Chinese culture. It looks at the incredible skills that are required to prepare multi-course banquets and it discusses the long training process that must be undertaken in order to become a chef. The program also examines the different types of food that came from different areas of China.
